snippet: Standard Chartered, which has thrived so far during Europe's debt crisis, faces costly fines in an investigation of its financial dealings with Iran.
abstract: Standard Chartered, which has thrived so far during Europe's debt crisis, faces costly fines in an investigation of its financial dealings with Iran.

headline.main: Iran Inquiry Is Abrupt Reversal for Standard Chartered
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Into Iran Deals Is an Abrupt Reversal At Standard Chartered
